known_issues: Book has not been added to the project/build yet.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the book content/resource to the project (currently missing)
Add the missing Honeydew book PDF files to the frontend static assets so every backend `Book.assetPath` currently returned by `getBooks()` resolves to a real, publicly accessible file path.

Ensure the backend book catalog returned by `getBooks()` corresponds to the actual added book resources (PDF filenames/paths) and, if any filenames differ from the added assets, update `Book.assetPath` values to match exactly.

projectName: Add the missing Honeydew book PDFs so the library can open them
